abstract: The bounds of the PDF context for the current page.
overview:
## Discussion

This value represents the bounds provided to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext/beginPage(withBounds:pageInfo:)] method that created the current page. If the current page was created using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext/beginPage()] method, the bounds are equal to those provided at the initialization of the PDF renderer.

# pdfContextBounds

**Instance Property**

The bounds of the PDF context for the current page.

## Declaration

```swift
var pdfContextBounds: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

This value represents the bounds provided to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext/beginPage(withBounds:pageInfo:)] method that created the current page. If the current page was created using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext/beginPage()] method, the bounds are equal to those provided at the initialization of the PDF renderer.
title: pdfContextBounds
